page.title: 10LOCAL EMPLOYMENT FOR WOMEN
page.content: There are three main sources of employment for women. Many of the jobs in the light industrial factories on the Purley Way Estate area are done by women. Some factories work flexible hours so women can be with their fam- ilies. There is secretarial work in the offices in the London Road. The main office block is the Phillips Building. Many women work in the Mayday and Croydon General Hospital complex. These are two large general hospitals which employ many nurses, office staff, ward orderlies and cleaners, all on a shift system. The complex also includes the Lodge Road Clinics (child health, teeth and eyes) and St. Mary's Maternity Hospital.
